MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This mapping ensures that at least one record in the Pay Period table is set to current. No more than one record in the Pay Period table should be current.
MAPPING.NAME: m_Pay_Calendar_Verify_Pay_Calendar

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT MAX(PAY_PERIOD.PP_NUM) PP_NUM , MAX(PAY_PERIOD.PP_END_YEAR) PP_END_YEAR FROM PAY_PERIOD

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT COUNT(*) as COUNT_CURRENT FROM PAY_PERIOD WHERE CURR_PP_FLAG = 'Y'

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
DECODE(TRUE, v_CURRENT_FLAG_SET = TRUE, '!!!! Current flag has been properly set',
v_CURRENT_FLAG_SET = FALSE AND (ISNULL (lkp_COUNT_CURRENT) OR lkp_COUNT_CURRENT = 0), ABORT('!!!! There is no pay period set.'),
v_CURRENT_FLAG_SET = FALSE AND lkp_COUNT_CURRENT > 1, ABORT('!!!! There are more than one pay periods set to current.') )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CURRENT_FLAG_SET

MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This mapping uses the contents of a parameter file to determine whether a row will be set to current on the Pay Period table. If the parameters within the parameter file are set, the values within the parameter file will be used to determine the current pay period. If the parameters within the parameter file are empty, the system date will be used to determine the current pay period.
MAPPING.NAME: m_Pay_Calendar_Set_Pay_Calendar

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This Router transformation uses the flag set by the previous Expression transformation to determine if the Current Pay Period will be set using the values from the parameter file or the System Date
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: rtr_Parameter_Non_Parameter

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation sets output port o_CURRENT_DATE to the run time of the session which will be used by the following lookup to get the Current Pay Period.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: exp_Set_Date

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation sets the output port o_CURR_PP_FLAG to Y. The key fields for the Pay Period table PP_NUM and PP_END_YEAR are brought in from the previous lookup.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: exp_Set_Current_Pay_Period_Non_Param

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Perform a lookup on the Pay Period table matching the values from the parameter value.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: lkp_Existing_Pay_Period

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This tranformation determines if the value from the lookup lkp_Existing_Pay_Period has returned a match from the values in the parameter file and sets a flag to be used by the following Router transformation.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: exp_Determine_Parameters_Exist

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This lookup uses the date set in the previous Expression transformation and matches it against the Start Date and End Date in the Pay Period table.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: lkp_New_Current_Pay_Period

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This update strategy will flag the row for an Update at run time. The reserved word of DD_UPDATE is used in the Update Strategy Expression on the Properties tab.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: upd_Set_Current_PP_Non_Param

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This update strategy will flag the row for an Update at run time. The reserved word of DD_UPDATE is used in the Update Strategy Expression on the Properties tab.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: upd_Set_Current_PP_Param

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT MAX(PAY_PERIOD.PP_NUM) PP_NUM , MAX(PAY_PERIOD.PP_END_YEAR) PP_END_YEAR FROM PAY_PERIOD

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: The parameters PP_NUM and PP_END_YEAR are set to outport ports which will be validated in the following tranformation.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: exp_Initial

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation sets the output port o_CURR_PP_FLAG to Y.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: exp_Set_Current_Pay_Period_Param

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This Router transformation uses the flag set by the previous Expression transformation to determine if the Current Pay Period will be set using the values from the parameter file or the System Date
INSTANCE.NAME: rtr_Parameter_Non_Parameter

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This transformation sets output port o_CURRENT_DATE to the run time of the session which will be used by the following lookup to get the Current Pay Period.
INSTANCE.NAME: exp_Set_Date

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This transformation sets the output port o_CURR_PP_FLAG to Y. The key fields for the Pay Period table PP_NUM and PP_END_YEAR are brought in from the previous lookup.
INSTANCE.NAME: exp_Set_Current_Pay_Period_Non_Param

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Perform a lookup on the Pay Period table matching the values from the parameter value.
INSTANCE.NAME: lkp_Existing_Pay_Period

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This tranformation determines if the value from the lookup lkp_Existing_Pay_Period has returned a match from the values in the parameter file and sets a flag to be used by the following Router transformation.
INSTANCE.NAME: exp_Determine_Parameters_Exist

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This lookup uses the date set in the previous Expression transformation and matches it against the Start Date and End Date in the Pay Period table.
INSTANCE.NAME: lkp_New_Current_Pay_Period

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This update strategy will flag the row for an Update at run time. The reserved word of DD_UPDATE is used in the Update Strategy Expression on the Properties tab.
INSTANCE.NAME: upd_Set_Current_PP_Non_Param

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This update strategy will flag the row for an Update at run time. The reserved word of DD_UPDATE is used in the Update Strategy Expression on the Properties tab.
INSTANCE.NAME: upd_Set_Current_PP_Param

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: The parameters PP_NUM and PP_END_YEAR are set to outport ports which will be validated in the following tranformation.
INSTANCE.NAME: exp_Initial

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This transformation sets the output port o_CURR_PP_FLAG to Y.
INSTANCE.NAME: exp_Set_Current_Pay_Period_Param

MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This mapping queries the Pay Calendar table for the record marked current and uses that record to build the subject and message for an email message.
MAPPING.NAME: m_Pay_Calendar_Build_Message

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: The filter condition on the Properties Tab will return the record where the CURR_PP_FLAG is set to 'Y'.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_PAY_PERIOD

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation sets the mapping variables MAP_SUBJECT and MAP_MESSAGE using the record marked current in the PAY PERIOD table.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: exp_Initial

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: v_ENVIRONMENT || 'Pay Calendar Process Completed Successfully for: ' || TO_CHAR(PP_END_YEAR) || '-' || v_PP_NUM
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_SUBJECT

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
'Current Pay Period = ' || v_PP_NUM ||
CHR(10) ||
'Begin Date = ' || TO_CHAR(PP_START_DTE, 'MM/DD/YYYY') ||
CHR(10) ||
'End Date = ' || TO_CHAR(PP_END_DTE, 'MM/DD/YYYY')
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_MESSAGE

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: The filter condition on the Properties Tab will return the record where the CURR_PP_FLAG is set to 'Y'.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_PAY_PERIOD

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This transformation sets the mapping variables MAP_SUBJECT and MAP_MESSAGE using the record marked current in the PAY PERIOD table.
INSTANCE.NAME: exp_Initial

MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This mapping retrieves the record from the Pay Period table currently set to current and resets that record to the default.
MAPPING.NAME: m_Pay_Calendar_Reset_Pay_Calendar

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: The filter condition on the Properties Tab will return the record where the CURR_PP_FLAG is set to 'Y'.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_PAY_PERIOD_RESET

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation sets the field CURR_PP_FLAG to the default value of NULL.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: exp_Initial

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This update strategy will flag the row for an Update at run time. The reserved word of DD_UPDATE is used in the Update Strategy Expression on the Properties tab.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: upd_Reset_Current_PP

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: The filter condition on the Properties Tab will return the record where the CURR_PP_FLAG is set to 'Y'.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_PAY_PERIOD_RESET

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This transformation sets the field CURR_PP_FLAG to the default value of NULL.
INSTANCE.NAME: exp_Initial

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This update strategy will flag the row for an Update at run time. The reserved word of DD_UPDATE is used in the Update Strategy Expression on the Properties tab.
INSTANCE.NAME: upd_Reset_Current_PP
